name: De-Val
summary: de_val sets the new benchmark for AI excellence, offering a decentralized evaluation platform designed to enhance LLM performance with unmatched quality. With de_val, you can rigorously test your AI models throughout the ML ops pipeline (offline testing, A/B testing, and continuous monitoring), measuring hallucinations, misattributions, relevancy, and summarization comprehensiveness, so you can understand your outputs at scale and deploy with confidence.
